archimate:ApplicationService.name: Real Time Processing
archimate:ApplicationService.documentation:
For many digital video systems, such as digital libraries and video servers, video parsing is a procedure used when processing large amounts of video data, especially in real-time.
Maybe the video is in a format that makes is big and we may need to convert this into a format that small so that we can save on storage space so there is need to pre process this data.
EG (.m4a, .m4b, .m4p) this is for files EG (WAV and MPEG) for video files
